property.name: dfs.namenode.rpc-bind-host
property.description: Controls what IP address the NameNode RPC server binds to. 0.0.0.0 means all available.

property.name: dfs.namenode.servicerpc-bind-host
property.description: Controls what IP address the NameNode service RPC server binds to. 0.0.0.0 means all available.

property.name: dfs.namenode.http-bind-host
property.description: Controls what IP address the NameNode HTTP server binds to. 0.0.0.0 means all available.

property.name: dfs.namenode.https-bind-host
property.description: Controls what IP address the NameNode HTTPS server binds to. 0.0.0.0 means all available.
